name: CHUGACH ALASKA CORP

Implementation of Tribal Benefits tax legislation (P.L.114-113).

FY 2018 Appropriations bill, specifically Defense Appropriations related to base operations and maintenance and provisions affecting Native American contracting.

Issues related to land use and conveyance of Native Settlement Lands, land exchanges with the federal government.
